Package homeschooltracker.content

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • homeschooltracker.content.Task
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Lesson, Material, Subject
    public abstract class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that forms a Task. The Subject, Lesson, and Material classes extend this.
    See Also:
    Subject, Lesson, Material

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add​(Task task)
        Adds another Task to this Task. For example, a Subject Task might contain one or more Lesson Task(s). A Lesson Task might contain one or more Material Task(s).
        Parameters:
        task - The task to add to this task.

      • getChild

        public Task getChild​(int position)
        Gets the Task from a specific position.
        Parameters:
        position - The position to get the Task from.
        Returns:
        The Task from the position.

        Returns:
        The name of the Task.

      • isPrepared

        public boolean isPrepared()
        Gets whether this Task state to the IsPreparedState
        Returns:
        True if the Task has been prepared; False if it has not.
        See Also:
        IsPreparedState

      • getCurrentTask

        public Task getCurrentTask()

        Gets whether this Task state to the CurrentLessonState

        See Also:

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Forms a string of to-do list task for the user. Has 3 checkboxes for whether an item is prepared (by Parent), completed (by Student), or graded (by Parent).
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A formatted string of the task.
